title: Italian Girl
inscriptions: left below center in red: Prendergast; verso c. two exhibition labels: [Prendergast Centennial Exhibition; WCMA]; verso u.c. in pencil: Maurice B Prendergast/ Italian girl [underlined] 18 x 11 1/2/ return to Mrs Charles Prendergast/ Westport, Conn.; verso u.r. in red pencil: 8; verso u.l.: [three labels]; verso l.c. on frame on tape in crayon: No46 9 [9 encircled]; verso u.l. on frame in marker: Bx46-3
